description.name: Protective mask 3-layer
description.long_desc:
Przeznaczenie i zakres stosowania wyrobu:

Maseczka ochronna – maska higieniczna , ma zastosowanie w laboratoriach, gabinetach lekarskich, zakładach spożywczych, instytucjach i miejscach masowej obsługi osób. Zabezpiecza użytkownika przed drobnoustrojami, pyłami, alergenami, kurzem, roztoczami, pleśnią, smogiem. Chroni przed wieloma infekcjami dróg oddechowych rozprzestrzeniającymi się kropelkowo.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • 3 warstwowa, wykonana z włóknin filtracyjnych najnowsze technologie ochrony dróg oddechowych – technologia Melt Blown
  • mocowana na gumkę
  • kształt maski dostosowany do układu twarzy, wszyty clipband dopasowujący maskę
  • włókniny stosowanie w masce posiadają certyfikaty: „Oeko-Tex standard 100” , certyfikat FIRA oraz atest PZH
  • kolor losowy: biały/czarny
  • możliwość kilkukrotnego prania i prasowania
    Maska wielorazowa, można ją prać w temperaturze 60 stopni.

Ze względu na przeznaczenie produkty nie podlegają zwrotom.
Prosimy o przemyślane zakupy.

category.name: For Wood
category.path: Cutting Tools\Discs With Tungsten Carbide Blade\For Wood

category_idosell.path: Cutting Tools\Discs With Tungsten Carbide Blade\For Wood

description.name: TCT Saw blade 250x32x80T + ring 25,4mm
description.long_desc:
Wood cutting blade with a carbide-tipped blade. Made of high-quality steel. Designed for precise cutting of wood, chipboards, and carpentry. Ideally suited to professional carpentry and construction works.


Technical data



  • Dial diameter: 250 mm

  • Mounting hole: 32 mm

  • Number of cutters: 80

  • Maximum speed: 5,500 rpm

  • Additional information: 32 / 25.4 mm reduction included
description.short_desc:

description.name: Laser Level Cross Basic
description.long_desc:
Self-leveling cross line laser. Designed to project diagonal lines - inclined at any angle, thanks to the lock function.


One working mode:



  • vertical and horizontal line



Product features


One operation mode
projection of diagonal lines - lock function
Precise and very clearly visible laser lines
Tripod Connection: 1/4 "


Technical data


Laser class: 2
Accuracy: ± 3mm / 10m
Working range: 15 - 20 m
Power supply: 3 AA (LR6) 1.5V batteries
Tripod Connection: 1/4 "


The set includes a cover for the laser, a mounting clip with a 1/4 "thread and 3 LR6 AM3 1.5V batteries.

description.name: Laser Level Cross 360 degrees
description.long_desc:
Laser Level Cross 360 degrees. Blocking function allows the laser to be aligned at different angles.


Three working modes:



  • Vertical mode

  • Horizontal & Vertical + 360° mode

  • 360° mode


Product Features



  • Three working modes

  • Allows projection of diagonal lines

  • Precise and very clearly visible laser lines

  • 1/4 Inch thread mount


Technical Data



  • Accuracy: ± 3 mm/10m

  • Working Range: 20 - 25 m

  • Battery: 4 x 1.5 V LR6 (AA)

  • Tripod Thread: 1/4"

  • Protection Class: II


The set includes a cover for the laser and 4pcs LR6 AM3 1.5V batteries.

description.name: L-Shape Magnetic Bracket Laser Level Adapter
description.long_desc:
L-Shape Magnetic Bracket Laser Level Adapter


Product Features



  • 4 large magnets with all fittings for attachment to the wall mounts

  • Laser bracket with Micro-fine height adjustment knob

  • Horizontal rotation at 360°

  • 1/4" male thread mounts to laser level device

  • 1/4" female thread mounts to tripods


Technical Data



  • Size: 125 x 120 x 85 mm

  • Height Adjustment: 0 - 73 mm

description.name: Telescopic Rod 3,2m
description.long_desc:
This 3-section telescopic rod with adjustable height is perfect for both professional and home applications. The rod consists of three aluminum segments, allowing precise height adjustment.


Thanks to the telescopic segments, the height of the rod can be adjusted from 126 cm to 320 cm, providing maximum flexibility during work. Quick and easy height adjustment is possible with convenient cam locks, and the last segment is equipped with a spring that automatically locks the rod in place, ensuring stability and safety.


Main Features:



  • 3-section construction: The rod consists of three aluminum segments, allowing precise height adjustment.

  • Telescopic adjustment: Thanks to the telescopic segments, the height of the rod can be adjusted from 126 cm to 320 cm, providing maximum flexibility during work.

  • Cam locks: Quick and easy height adjustment with convenient cam locks.

  • Spring lock: The last segment is equipped with a spring that automatically locks the rod in place, ensuring stability and safety.

  • Adjustable holder with 1/4" thread: Universal laser mount, compatible with most devices available on the market.

  • Durable materials: Made of durable aluminum and plastic, ensuring long-lasting use.

  • Color: Aesthetic finish in blue and black.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Thread: 1/4"

  • Maximum height: 320 cm / 3.2 m

  • Minimum height: 126 cm / 1.26 m

  • Material: Aluminum, plastic

  • Number of sections: 3

  • Color: Blue-black

category.name: Service Equipment
category.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Service Equipment

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Service Equipment

description.name: 10L Portable Air Sandblaster
description.long_desc:
Compact and lightweight Portable Air Sandblaster. Ideal for removing paint, rust, dirt/grease, burrs from metals and marks from brick & stone. Includes a sandblasting gun, delivery hose and ceramic nozzle tips 4, 5, 6, 7 mm.



  • Operating Pressure: 6.9 Bar / 100 psi

  • Air Input Requirement: about 280 L/min

  • Air Inlet Connector: 1/4” BSP
description.short_desc:
Compact and lightweight Portable Air Sandblaster. Ideal for removing paint, rust, dirt/grease, burrs from metals and marks from brick & stone. Includes a sandblasting gun, delivery hose and ceramic nozzle tips 4, 5, 6, 7 mm.

  • Air Inlet Connector: 1/4” BSP

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage

description.name: Hydraulic Trolley Jack 2,5T - low profile SMART
description.long_desc:
Robust and stable Hydraulic Trolley Jack 2,5T.


Product Features



  • 2,5 tonne lifting capacity

  • Ultra low profile at 85mm can fit under nearly all cars

  • 385 mm lifting height

  • Integrated carry handle

  • Hydraulic pump with relief valve

  • Rubber pad for vehicle protection

  • Steel large two wheels and two swivel castors to enable easy positioning


Technical Data



  • Loading Capacity: 2,5 tonne

  • Minimum Height: 85 mm

  • Maximum Height: 385 mm

  • Weight: approx. 12,5 kg


Package Contents:



  • 1x Hydraulic trolley

  • 1x Handle 50cm

  • 1x Rubber pad for saddle

category.name: M14 Diamond Hole Saws
category.path: Cutting Tools\Diamond Tools\M14 Diamond Hole Saws

category_idosell.path: Cutting Tools\Diamond Tools\M14 Diamond Hole Saws

description.name: Dry diamond drill M14 6mm
description.long_desc:
Diamond drill bit for dry drilling. Equipped with an M14 shank suitable for angle grinders. Perfect for making holes in materials such as: porcelain stoneware, ceramic tiles, clinker, glaze.


Hole saws in sizes from 6mm to 16mm have been poured from the inside with wax that receives heat from the diamond, preventing it from overheating. However, you should remember to remove the excavated material from the hole saw on an ongoing basis.


Product features



  • outer diameter: 6 mm

  • diamond coating: 10 mm

  • mounting: M14 shank suitable for angle grinders

  • holesaws in sizes from 6mm to 16mm were covered with wax from the inside
description.short_desc:
